main: ^Do you already know how this works?

c-0: ^Wait, no! I already know how this works!

explanation: ^This is the underworld. In this world, you can collect tokens to reincarnate yourself into different beings.

c-0: ^You'll see! Try collecting the token behind me and then press the 'R' button to reincarnate yourself.
^At the end of each level, you will find a magical blue flame. Touch this flame to proceed to the next level.
^What happens when I touch the last blue flame?
^Hmm... Good question. I haven't created a proper ending yet. Anyway, have fun!
